channel.title: CVE Feed for The Linux Kernel Organization -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Linux Kernel Organization -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2586|2024-08-19T07:48:13.351Z -- the%20linux%20kernel%20organization -- linux
item.description: It was discovered that a nft object or expression could reference a nft set on a different nft table, leading to a use-after-free once that table was deleted.
